Html:
I installed the new march tool kit and add refrences to wpftoolkit.

1. Can I drag and drop a datagrid on to my work space?, if not how do i access/the control propetities to the datagrid?

After installing the toolkit and adding the reference to it, you should be able to drag and drop the WPF datagrid on to your work space.  Give it a try and let us know if you have any further question.
